content: Ok, can you be more specific with a couple options on looking ready to go that are lightweight and can be done quickly. Just trying to get ideas because he isn't always cooperative, but if you suggest something that he does anyway that would help. Like he does this thing 'breakdown' where if I break down, he'll get in a stance like a downward dog fast ready to pounce. He'll look at you with football in his mouth, but usually will just drop it at your feet and look at you, like, hey, throw the ball. if i push him and stuff, hell get pretty hyped up and growl and bark a little, but that would be tough to film because I'd be in it i think. But if you have ideas, let me know and will make something happen.
